february.title: Reporting -  Partial degraded performance
february.service: We have identified an issue affecting report generation starting on February 7th,
february.raw: We have identified an issue affecting report generation starting on February 7th, 2023.  Our engineering team is engaged in actively monitoring the situation and is continuing to work on expediting the generation of the reports.  Manually generated reports as well as the following scheduled reports may be affected by this generation delay:  - Settlement Detail Report- Payment Accounting Report- Received Payment Details Report- Interactive Payment Accounting Report- Dispute Report  In the case of automatically generated reports, it is not required to manually request reports from our Customer Area. Merchants listening to notifications will be able to download the reports once they receive the REPORT_AVAILABLE notification.  Please follow updates through our Status page (www.adyen.com/status).

april.title: [Update] Customer Area and Modifications delay
april.raw: We have identified an issue starting at 00:30 CET affecting the Customer Area (ca-live.adyen.com). As a result, search capabilities, payment data visualizations and case management displays for some transactions is being affected.  Additionally, notifications and modifications (such as refunds, captures and third party payouts) may be processed with a delay.  Payment processing is not affected by this incident.  Our engineering team has been engaged and is urgently working to resolve this issue.  We will provide a new update in the next 30 minutes.

We will share an update as soon as more information becomes available.

september.title: [Resolved] American Express India - Elevated Error Rate
Degraded performance for multiple payment methods in Europe as of 11:11 CEST
september.service: We have identified an issue starting at 11:11 CEST causing intermittent errors on several acquirer connections, including Visa and
september.raw: We have identified an issue starting at 11:11 CEST causing intermittent errors on several acquirer connections, including Visa and Mastercard.  Our engineering team has been engaged and is urgently working to resolve this issue. We will provide an update in 15 minutes.  You can also follow future updates through our status page (https://status.adyen.com).

september.title: iDEAL - Elevated Error Rate
september.raw: We have identified an issue outside of our platform resulting in an elevated error rate for transactions processed through iDEAL starting at 07:10 CEST.  This impacts SNS Bank and Rabobank.  iDEAL is aware of the issue and the status can be followed on iDEAL's status page: https://availability.ideal.nl
